_comment: Bundled OAuth defaults for platform integrations. LLM providers use API keys only (BYOK).

google.setup_instructions:
1. Go to Google Cloud Console → APIs & Services → Credentials
2. Create OAuth 2.0 Client ID (type: Desktop app)
3. Enable the Generative Language API
4. Copy the client_id and paste it here or in ~/.orion/oauth_clients.json

microsoft.setup_instructions:
1. Go to Azure Portal → App Registrations → New Registration
2. Set redirect URI to: http://localhost:8001/api/oauth/callback (Web type)
3. Under API permissions, add Azure OpenAI access
4. Copy the Application (client) ID and paste it here or in ~/.orion/oauth_clients.json
